readable.title: 3319899418_4bcf1b00d8
readable.content: A person in a green jacket and yellow pants is on a snowboard coming down a roof into the snow . A snowboarder goes up a ramp . A snowboarder slides down the side of an A-frame house buried in snow . Someone snowboards up the roof of a barn . The snowboarder does a trick off the side of a large green building .
